rule.description: ATT&CK T1038: Windows Registry Persistence COM Search Order Hijacking
rule.info: Detects potential COM object hijacking leveraging the COM Search Order
Falsepositives: Some installed utilities (i.e. OneDrive) may serve new COM objects at user-level.

rule.description: Whitelist Interaction: Windows Registry Persistence COM Search Order Hijacking
rule.info: Detects potential COM object hijacking leveraging the COM Search Order
Falsepositives: Some installed utilities (i.e. OneDrive) may serve new COM objects at user-level.
